Sentencas: A phenomenon of electrochemical promotion of lattice-oxygen extraction from the bulk phase of YSZ is observed during direct methane oxidation to generate syngas at 800 degrees C in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with Ni-YSZ (yuria-stabilized zirconia) anodes.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes
Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: of oxygen than that equivalent to the measured current is extracted for anodic oxidation.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: This promotion effect increases as the potential (voltage) increases.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: A phenomenon of fuel-free current is observed to be a consequence of this effect.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: The electrochemically promoted extraction of bulk lattice oxygen is influenced by both the operating condition and the reaction type.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: Both rate enhancement ratios of CO and CO2 formations are linearly related to the measured current density but inversely linearly related to the voltage.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: As the current density increases, both methane conversion and CO selectivity increase.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes

Sentencas: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction enhances the syngas generation.
Titulo: Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes
Electrochemical promotion of bulk lattice-oxygen extraction for direct methane conversion to syngas in SOFCs with Ni-YSZ anodes
